overview:
Shanti Bergel brings a career-long passion for Web and game entrepreneurship to his role as Senior Vice President of Business & Corporate Development at GREE.  Building upon nearly 20 years of experience in the gaming industry, Shanti is recognized as an expert on virtual goods and free-to-play game monetization.

Prior to joining GREE, Shanti oversaw monetization, distribution, licensing and corporate development at social game developer Playfish. He also headed business development at at Three Rings, a pioneer in the games-as-a-service sector and led console, PC, mobile, online, and casual game development for The Sims and FIFA at Electronic Arts.

Shanti speaks fluent Japanese and blogs on social gaming at shantibergel.com.
